Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes retroactive tier III membership in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Steven R. Grice
Summary: Authorizes retroactive tier III membership in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Steven R. Grice.
ActClause: AN ACT granting retroactive tier III membership in the New York state and local employees' retirement system to Steven R. Grice
